mean_en: the belief that what will happen has already been decided and cannot be changed
word_etyma: fatal致命的+ism学术流派 →宿命论
short_phrase: Her fatalism leads her to believe in fortune telling.
sentence: Adherents of fatalism believe that nothing can change the future.
sentence_trans: 宿命论的拥护者相信没有什么能够改变未来。
